Change Log

==========

0.0.1 (22/10/2021)
----------------------
- First Release
- From Actions Implemented:
    - Medium Motor

0.0.3 (30/11/2021)
----------------------
- Upgraded Medium Motor with classes for easier uses

0.0.4 (14/01/2022)
----------------------
- From Actions Implemented:
    - Grand Motor
    - Standard Control
    - Lever Control
- More readable code

0.1.1 ()
-----------------------
-From Controls Implemented:
    - Start Block
    - Loop
        - Unlimited
        - Iterations
        - Time
